description: Apple employees are fighting against a new policy requiring them to return to work three days a week in an open letter addressed to Tim Cook on Slack. Approximately 80 people were involved in writing the letter. Employees have argued that the company should adopt a flexible approach for those who still want to remotely work from home.
author: hyatt d.
